review_data.title: FOOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review_data.content: very good food and nice staff also a very nice restaurant with many options from food to games like billiard snooker and darts

review_data.title: Switzerland does American
review_data.content: Switzerland does American Bar brilliantly. Head to Pot Belly’s for a taste of very generous USA style food. Menu offers huge portions (even the small is massive). Spend time to play pool or darts or just sit and chat. Going on your own? Owner Darren...More

review_data.content: Das Potbellys ist immer super! Allerdings machte beim Heutigem Besuch, die Küche schon vor 22:00 Uhr zu (im Internet steht...More

review_data.title: Des burgers de la bière et billards
review_data.content: Un endroit sympa pour passer une soiree entre amis. Grand choix de bières. Les match de foot sont retransmis sur...More

review_data.title: Large Indian group
review_data.content: We had a great time! Delicious fried food platters, meat based and vegetarian. The service was lovely, there was a nice Irish lady, who was efficient and friendly. I'm looking forward to my next visit, and maybe even the full Irish some weekend!

review_data.title: Great pub food, beers and pub sports available too
review_data.content: We had a great summer Friday evening here sitting outside. No view but good atmosphere. Good selection of pub foods, all well cooked and good portions. We had BBQ spare ribs (27.90CHF), Cajun chicken breast (23.90 CHF), and 3 different burgers priced around 24CHF. More...More

review_data.title: Great Beer - Nice atmosphere
review_data.content: The place had great options to choose from for the Beers and the French Fries were awsome.Great Pub Sports facilities, pool, darts and even full size snooker tables

review_data.content: Ein kühlen Bier, allenfalls noch einen Burger. Perfekt! Das Lokal ist urig, misch unmögliche Farben mir Billiard und Fernsehapparaten. Freundlichen...More

review_data.title: Nachtessen
review_data.content: Schnelle und bewährte Küche mengenmässig nicht zu beklagen. Mit gutem billardsaal ausgestückt und mit anderen Spielen ausgestattet👍

review_data.title: Expensive burgers - Nothing exceptional
review_data.content: I went to eat bthere with a friend. We both had a burger and a drink and a coffee afterwards. The service is not bad but the burgers are just average. It is quite busy at times. I cannot say that it is anything but...More

review_data.title: Honest Decent Tasty Quality Pub Food with Sports
review_data.content: A lovely, varied pub food menu including curries. Various international drinks. Very VERY clean toilets. Nice, clean, modern venue. Great Pub Sports facilities, pool, darts and even full size snooker tables. Service is always slow and mediocre. Don't wait fro them to come to you...More

review_data.title: Great beer, great food, great atmosphere.
review_data.content: I've been several times, it is so enjoyable to be there. A great place to get English or American food near Zurich. Wide selection of pub food, burgers, salads, and especially beers. The owner was very friendly, as well as the staff. Prices are reasonable....More

review_data.title: Hier geht's nicht nur um Kulinarik
review_data.content: Der Reiz dieses Lokals besteht in der Kombination von Billiard, Darts, Sportübertragungen an unzähligen Monitoren und American Food. Rein wegen...More

review_data.title: Super für After Work...
review_data.content: Das Pot Belly's ist perfekt für einen After-Work-Drink zum Abschalten mit Kollegen, auch in einer grösseren Gruppe: Es hat eine...More

review_data.title: Toller Pub, für Gruppen geteignet.
review_data.content: Der Pub am Bahnhof adliswil ist sehr geräumig und bietet auch grossen Gruppen platz. Das Angebot an Bier ist gut...More

review_data.title: Un super pub
review_data.content: Très bon pub, jeux de darts, billards, et hamburgers qui valent la peine d'être goûter ! Le service très sympa...More

review_data.title: Burger & co
review_data.content: Cooles Lokal und nettes Personal. Sehr leckere Küche und grosse Portionen. Vom Cocktail bis zum Billardtisch alles vorhanden :)!

review_data.title: Great spot for a bite to eat with good service!
review_data.content: We have been going to Pot Belly's for quite some time now and realised I had not given a rating, which based on my experience is one of the most relaxing places I have been to. This review is long overdue. The salads are amazing,...More

review_data.title: Nice food and good selection of beers
review_data.content: This place does surprisingly good food at a good price for Zurich. All the food you get is quite good standard and portions are good. Most eating establishments in Zurich you come away thinking it was nice but overpriced or you could have mae it...More

review_data.title: A good spot for beer and games
review_data.content: Pot Belly’s is located in Adliswil and is about a 12 minute ride on the S4 (Sood-Leimbach) from the main train station. Walk over the pedestrian bridge from the train platform and you have made it to Pot Belly’s. There is a large patio seating...More

review_data.title: American Sportsbar
review_data.content: A classic sportsbar to watch Sport or just have a beer with the typical fast food, which was good in that case. Easy going bar for peoople who might not be the biggest fans of french bistros.

review_data.title: Super Sportsbar
review_data.content: 13 Biere am Gahn, auch Spaten. Billiard und Dart. Hervorragende Burger, super Pommes. Engagierter Service, zum Teil besser in englisch...More

review_data.title: Always great place for a beer
review_data.content: Always stop here for a beer or two. Convenient to the S4 line. The wings are great - if you are looking for healthier fare the Caesar salad is great - add chicken / bacon to tone down the healthiness.

review_data.title: Great pub food and selection of drinks
review_data.content: Situated right by the Sood-Oberleimach train station (up one level from ground) this place has great burgers and beer. A typical pub run by Darren and his friendly team this place is HUGE inside with a lot of snooker/pool tables. I have become a regular...More

review_data.title: If you like Burger try it!
review_data.content: Even if the location could be better, I highly recommend this place. Portions are huge, prices are low and the service is accommodating and attentive. On a warm summer evening there is a lounge outside and on a cold winter day you can play billiard...More

review_data.title: Good hangout location afterwork
review_data.content: This is good place to chat and enjoy time with your colleagues. Be aware that you will end up eating the junk /fried food here. Perfect location as it is just above the railway station.

review_data.title: Tastey but pricey.....for the non Swiss visitors.
review_data.content: We had a late breakfast here as it was close to where we staying. We were the first customers of the day and were well received. The menu is what you would expect from a bar/pool hall, and the portions were on the generous side...More

review_data.title: Relaxed place for an informal night out with friends
review_data.content: There is quite a broad menu , consisting of salads through to burgers and English favorites such as a full English breakfast and fish and chips. The portions are pretty big. If you want to play pool, snooker or darts, there are lots of tables...More

review_data.title: Amerikanisch
review_data.content: Die Portionen sind nach Amerikanischen Stil gross. Der Kabissalat darf auch nicht fehlen. Die Dachterasse ist schön angelegt und verführt...More

review_data.title: Ein toller Ort um seinen Feierabend zu verbringen
review_data.content: Mit einer grossen und vielfältigen Auswahl an Bier und fantastischem Essen überzeugt Pot Bellys die Kunden. Ich bin ebenfalls beeindruckt...More

review_data.title: Abendessen
review_data.content: War kurz vor Weihnachten im Pot Bellys mit einigen Geschäftskollegen, um eine Runde Billard zu spielen. Es war richtig was...More

review_data.title: Best Atmosphere in Zurich
review_data.content: Potbellys is a fantastic place to eat, drink and relax. The food and atmosphere are wonderful and the staff are friendly and attentive. Best range of local and expat beer in the whole of Switzerland served from a really interesting bar.

review_data.title: Best burgers in Zurich
review_data.content: Great atmosphere, friendly staff, great food and big portions, huge range of beers on tap, really good deals...if you dont try it out, you are missing out, a great place to eat, be with friends and watch all the sports on tv. Not to mention...More

review_data.title: Incredible Deal / Great Value
review_data.content: If you haven't stopped by Pot Belly's in Adliswil, you are really missing something. The food is 'American Grill Style'. The portions are huge and the price reasonable. They cater to families, singles and business types and have a broad range of beer to satisfy...More
